news.title: Peace Activists Celebrate as Barclays Sells Shares of Israeli Weapons Maker Elbit Systems
news.description: Pro-Palestinian activists have called off protests after Barclays revealed it had sold its shares in Elbit Systems, Israel’s largest weapons manufacturer.
news.content: Protests were called off after Barclays announced that it had sold all its shares in Elbit Systems, a company that manufactures military technology used in the Israeli-Palestinian conflict.
news.author: Sarah Johnson

news.title: Trump Taps FCC’s Brendan Carr to Chair Communications Agency
news.description: Former President Trump has chosen Brendan Carr, a critic of Big Tech, to chair the Federal Communications Commission (FCC), signaling changes to Biden-era policies, including net neutrality.
news.content: Trump’s nomination of Brendan Carr to lead the FCC marks a shift towards policies favoring deregulation and opposing tech monopolies.
news.author: Michael Chang

news.title: Deadly Typhoon Man-yi Slams Philippines
news.description: Super Typhoon Man-yi caused severe flooding and landslides in the Philippines, marking the sixth major storm to hit the country in a month.
news.content: The Philippines is recovering from Typhoon Man-yi, which has killed dozens and displaced thousands, exacerbating the country’s ongoing battle with climate change.
news.author: Emily Tan

news.title: Spain Declares Mourning After Flash Flooding Death Toll Soars to 158
news.description: Flash floods in Spain have left 158 dead, with the heaviest destruction in Valencia. Authorities warn that more storms are expected.
news.content: The country mourns the devastating floods that have submerged entire towns and claimed the lives of hundreds, with more rain expected in the coming days.
news.author: Carlos Gomez

news.title: Kamala Harris Defends Women’s Rights Amidst Trump’s Attacks
news.description: Vice President Kamala Harris criticized Donald Trump for his stance on women’s rights, particularly regarding reproductive choices.
news.content: Kamala Harris has condemned Trump’s rhetoric and policies surrounding women’s reproductive rights, calling for better protection of women’s autonomy.
news.author: Lily Williams

news.title: G20 Protesters Demand More Action on Climate Crisis in Brazil
news.description: As the G20 summit convenes in Brazil, activists protest against global leaders' failure to address climate change and hunger.
news.content: Protests erupted in Brazil as G20 leaders faced criticism for not doing enough to combat climate change, despite worsening conditions worldwide.
news.author: Andre Souza

news.title: Guatemala Court Reverses House Arrest Order for Journalist José Rubén Zamora
news.description: A Guatemalan court has sent journalist José Rubén Zamora back to prison after overturning his house arrest decision.
news.content: José Rubén Zamora, a journalist known for his investigative reporting, faces legal battles as a court reinstates his prison sentence.
news.author: Ana Mejia
